heisigStory: Muscles . . . mouth. This is the only case in which the primitive for muscle appears on the left; note should be taken of the fact in composing one's story.
koohiiStory1: If you eat anymore, you will be adding more カロries. (katakana karo).
koohiiStory2: This is Power Mouth, the most annoying neighbour in the world who always has something to add.
myStory: thêm, cộng. chữ Gia. lực cho thêm vào miệng.
readingExamples: 加える (くわ.える), 加わる (くわ.わる)
words: moderate, right, random, not thorough, vague, irresponsible, halfhearted
